name: Knight in Chateau
description:
Welcome to the Chateau

Navigate each dungeon using your torch to light the way. Be careful not to run out of fuel for your torch, lest you be trapped in the darkness with nothing but your memory to help you find the exit.

Also don't touch the walls. They kill you for some reason.

Controls

Move with WASD or arrow keys. Light torch with Space Bar.

Source Code

If you want to see my git repository for this project, check it out here: https://github.com/BlackOpsBen/LuxJam_Light_and_Shadow

Lux Jam 01 - Theme: Light & Shadow

This game is my entry to the very first Lux Jam, March 2020! More info here: https://itch.io/jam/lux-jam
